General.Name: LAY-OUT Planning Consultants Co. Ltd.
General.Description: LAY-OUT Planning Consultants Co. Ltd. operates as a planning and engineering design consulting agency in China, Thailand, Malaysia, Pakistan, and Nigeria. It provides planning and design services, such as regional, strategic, concept, detailed, village, and TOD area planning services, as well as city renovation and urban design services; transportation, special traffic, and port and hub planning services; traffic, road, and bridge design services; and municipal engineering services, including drainage, electricity, communication, gas heating, sanitation, public safety, disaster prevention, pipe gallery, sponge city, and electric vehicle charging services. The company also offers development planning services, which include positioning research, industrial planning, financial decision, policy research, new district development planning, and old city renovation planning; landscape design, green plan, engineering design coordination, and landscape project management consulting services; and operation consulting services comprises investment promotion, project planning and screening, construction plan, and operation management services. LAY-OUT Planning Consultants Co. Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Cheng  Jin
1.Title: Director, Chief Financial Officer and Director Sec.
